organization: Česká televize (Czech Television) – Documentary Film Centre
background: Champions author-driven, experimental and innovative documentary filmmaking. Supports bold perspectives, minority voices and politically engaged projects.
thematic_priorities: Arts and culture with Czech/European resonance
content_not_wanted: Projects lacking originality or strong authorial voice
target_audience: Festival circuits and international co-production partners
budget_parameters: Range: CZK 150K–500K per hour Co-production top-ups possible for ambitious projects
technical_requirements: High artistic/visual quality; experimental freedom supported
current_calls: Bold cultural/political projects with minority perspectives
name: Kamila Zlatušková
